messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Update the phone number of the last person I sent a message to to +10293847563
Could you please provide the name or any other detail of the person you sent the message to? This will help me locate the correct contact in your database.
I don't have any more information, sorry.

In order to update the contact information, I need some way to identify the correct contact. Without additional information such as a name or previous phone number, I won't be able to proceed. Could you please check your records or messages to find any identifying details?
If the last message was sent correctly to Bart, can you use that to find the contact?

It seems there are no contacts matching the name "Bart" in your database. I'm unable to proceed with updating the phone number without a matching contact. If you have any other information or if the name might be slightly different, please let me know!
